Name: Suchi Patel

Overview
This project contains a vertex and a fragment shader written in GLSL, designed for dynamic 3D graphics rendering.

Implementation
Vertex Shader: Implements dynamic geometry transformations based on the time uniform.
Fragment Shader: Utilizes a shading model with diffuse and specular reflections. The color changes dynamically over time, influenced by the time uniform.

Compliance with Requirements
Fragment Shader Calculations: Lighting computations are performed in the fragment shader.
Shading Model: Both diffuse and specular reflections are included.
Dynamic Elements: Geometry deformation and color variation are implemented using the time uniform.

Link: http://shdr.bkcore.com/#
